---
name: How to create an issue
about: Proper etiquette to make an issue.
title: "[ISSUE]"
labels: ''
assignees: scriptdevvies

---

For feature requests, add
`Feature Request:`
to your issue and the label.
For bugs, add
`Executor:`
`Issue:`
and the bugs label.
For inquiries, and other stuff, state the inquiry, etc.
